plot: 14 year old Annabelle comes home to discover a strange man in her living room and her parents tied up and gagged. An intense game of questioning and answering ensues, resulting in a life changing choice for the young girl.
plot_es: 14 year old Annabelle comes home to discover a strange man in her living room and her parents tied up and gagged. An intense game of questioning and answering ensues, resulting in a life changing choice for the young girl.
